Class QUndoRedoItem

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--quiver.QUndoRedoItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
QUndoRedoAddedItem, QUndoRedoDeletedItem, QUndoRedoMovedPoint
public abstract class QUndoRedoItem
extends Object

class for tracking items added to/deleted from quiver, for undo/redo this is used by the undo/redo mechanism
